mapper.select: SELECT A.NOTICE_ID , A.TITLE , A.CONTENT , A.CREATED_AT , A.UPDATED_AT , A.ACTIVE_STATUS , A.GROUP_ID FROM STUDY_GROUP_NOTICE A WHERE A.GROUP_ID = #{ groupId } AND A.ACTIVE_STATUS = 'ACTIVE' ORDER BY A.NOTICE_ID DESC LIMIT #{ pageSize } OFFSET #{ offset }
SELECT A.NOTICE_ID , A.TITLE , A.CONTENT , A.CREATED_AT , A.UPDATED_AT , A.ACTIVE_STATUS , A.GROUP_ID FROM STUDY_GROUP_NOTICE A WHERE A.NOTICE_ID = #{ noticeId } AND A.ACTIVE_STATUS = 'ACTIVE'

SELECT A.NOTICE_ID , A.TITLE , A.CONTENT , A.CREATED_AT , A.UPDATED_AT , A.ACTIVE_STATUS , A.GROUP_ID FROM STUDY_GROUP_NOTICE A WHERE A.ACTIVE_STATUS = 'ACTIVE' AND A.TITLE LIKE CONCAT('%', #{ title }, '%') ORDER BY A.NOTICE_ID DESC LIMIT #{ pageSize } OFFSET #{ offset }

SELECT A.NOTICE_ID , A.TITLE , A.CONTENT , A.CREATED_AT , A.UPDATED_AT , A.ACTIVE_STATUS , A.GROUP_ID FROM STUDY_GROUP_NOTICE A WHERE A.ACTIVE_STATUS = 'ACTIVE' AND A.CONTENT LIKE CONCAT('%', #{ content }, '%') ORDER BY A.NOTICE_ID DESC LIMIT #{ pageSize } OFFSET #{ offset }
SELECT COUNT(*) AS TOTAL FROM STUDY_GROUP_NOTICE A WHERE A.GROUP_ID = #{ groupId } AND A.ACTIVE_STATUS = 'ACTIVE'
SELECT COUNT(*) AS TOTAL FROM STUDY_GROUP_NOTICE A WHERE A.ACTIVE_STATUS = 'ACTIVE' AND A.TITLE LIKE CONCAT('%', #{ title }, '%')
SELECT COUNT(*) AS TOTAL FROM STUDY_GROUP_NOTICE A WHERE A.ACTIVE_STATUS = 'ACTIVE' AND A.CONTENT LIKE CONCAT('%', #{ content }, '%')
